sourcesContent:
My Todo App

Fetching data from .NET Backend...

  • {{ item.task }} ✅ ❌
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; // Important for *ngFor @Component({ selector: 'app-root', standalone: true, // Assuming modern Angular 17/18 imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { public todos: any[] = []; // Inject HttpClient constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getTodos(); } getTodos() { // We use a relative path. The proxy sends this to .NET this.http.get('/api/todo').subscribe( (result) => { this.todos = result; }, (error) => { console.error('Error fetching todos:', error); } ); } }
